QueryResult.text: SELECT RTF.RESOURCE_ID, RTF.CALENDAR_TIME_KEY, RCF.OBS1_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS2_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS3_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS4_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS5_UNIT_ID, RTF.RESOURCE_CODE, RTF.LAST_NAME, RTF.FIRST_NAME, RTF.ROLE_ID, RTF.ROLE_NAME, RTF.RESOURCE_COMPANY_ID, RTF.RESOURCE_COMPANY, RTF.EXTERNAL_OR_INTERNAL, RTF.MANAGER_ID, RTF.MANAGER_LAST_NAME, RTF.MANAGER_FIRST_NAME, RTF.ENTITY, RTF.ENTITY_NAME, RTF.LOCATION, RTF.LOCATION_NAME, RTF.DEPARTMENT, RTF.DEPARTMENT_NAME, RTF.IS_ROLE, RTF.AVAILABLE_HOURS, RTF.ETC_HOURS, RTF.ACTUAL_HOURS, RTF.BASE_HOURS, RTF.ALLOCATED_HOURS FROM NBI_RT_FACTS RTF, NBI_RESOURCE_CURRENT_FACTS RCF WHERE RTF.RESOURCE_ID = RCF.RESOURCE_ID
